author: Snazzy Labs
description:
The Apple Vision Pro released a year ago—and things aren't great... or maybe it's all exaggerated and the thing isn't such a failure after all...

Globular Cluster CMA-1 strap for Vision Pro - https://amzn.to/4ia9p3r
Annapro strap for Vision Pro - https://amzn.to/4bjenZG

Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter - http://twitter.com/snazzyq
Follow me on Instagram - http://instagram.com/snazzyq

Apple’s Vision Pro has been out for a year, and while it’s not a total failure, it faces major challenges. VR fans expected innovation, but the Vision Pro struggles with comfort, limited developer support, and a lack of must-have apps. Despite excellent display quality, its high price and niche use cases make it feel more like a premium entertainment device than a productivity game-changer. Meanwhile, Meta Quest remains dominant in the otherwise tiny niche, proving that Apple’s headset has an uphill battle ahead.

0:00 - It’s already been a year
0:51 - (1) OLED Displays
1:42 - (2) The passthrough cameras
title: Apple Vision Pro Post-Mortem: What Happened...?!
